entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
Today, I asked President Trump to waive Virginia's obligation to pay 25 percent of #COVID19 costs under @fema's Public Assistance programs. This health crisis has had a significant impact on our state budget—a federal waiver will help our road to recovery.
https://t.co/I7mEVOwn18
